meanings.definition: A person who rides a bicycle for pleasure or exercise.
meanings.sent1: The group of pedalers enjoyed a leisurely ride through the park.
meanings.sent2: Many pedalers gather every weekend for a cycling event.
meanings.sent3: The pedalers raced each other to the finish line, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent4: The pedalers moved like a colorful parade through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The pedalers' laughter filled the air as they rode together.

meanings.definition: A person who sells goods by going from place to place.
meanings.sent1: The pedalers set up their stalls at the market early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: Local pedalers often offer unique handmade items to customers.
meanings.sent3: The pedalers charmed the townsfolk with their variety of wares.
meanings.sent4: The pedalers' voices echoed through the streets as they called out their goods.
meanings.sent5: The pedalers' colorful carts caught the eye of passersby.
